page.title: 04MR. TINSLEY'S FARM.
page.content: Mr. Tinsley was born on the farm. The buildings have been on the land for about fifty years and the farm, which consists of{75acres,}is worked by members of the Tinsley family although Mr. Tinsley himself works as a school caretaker. {Crops}such as{wheat, barley, oil {seed rape, potatoes}and{strawberries are grown. Around 30{cattle}are kept to be sold at market for{beef. {Machinery}used on the farm includes 3 {tractors,}a{combine- {harvester}with attachments such as a {potato harvester,}a{bailer, plough, {disc harrow}and{trailers. Numerous changes have occured while Mr. Tinsley has been involved in farming, notably the reduction of the workforce and the abandoning of pig and poultry farming.
